All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccountCollection
The AccountCollection class is a wrapper for an ArrayList of Accounts, including other methods that allow for adding and manipulating the array of Accounts for the MemoryGame application.
Accounts
The Accounts class allows for initialization of a user, with username, password, and MemoryGame related statistics.
Board
Contains information and methods related to the board on which the memory game is played.
BoardPane
The BoardPane class is a BorderPane that displays the MemoryGame and allows for user interaction with the game.
Card
Card class to represent the cards in the memory game
LeaderboardPane
This class represents a leaderboard pane in a game application.
LoginPane
The LoginPane class is a BorderPane that displays the login menu on the memoryGUI.
MemoryGame
The MemoryGame class holds info for the MemoryGame.
memoryGUI
 
OurObservable
 
OurObserver
 
StatsPane
The StatsPane class is a BorderPane that is added to memoryGUI to view game statistics of the current user.
